about_the_game:
Our world, it’s an awe inspiring, beautiful, vast place; with hundreds of castles, towns, villages forests and caves just waiting to be explored, and exploited. The rulers of Wessex, Mercia and The Danes dominate the land of Britannia their constant skirmishes are building to an all-out war as the Danes build the great pagan army and bring a second darkness to the land.

Outside their influence, mythical beasts roam the lands.

Whether you want to trade for profit, take part in multiplayer co-op quests alliances, free-for-all group battles and team raids to bring down large beasts and monsters, even tip the balance of power in the kingdom (for your own advantage, of course.), or simply explore the wonders of Britannia (and who knows what you’ll find out there...) is up to you.

Your second-to-second actions could have you taking the roles of trader, knight, bounty hunter, leader, team player, opportunistic assassin, grand schemer, and more. You are at the centre of the action any time, any place, and any way you choose – each action has a consequence and influences the world around you.
Starting with a few gold coins a name and a sword, carve your own path through the richest, large gaming sandbox ever created, set against a backdrop of feuding families, myths, and legends from medieval times.

Do whatever it takes to build your house into a mighty royal family.

name: Stormbane

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD A10-5800K APU (3.8GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 / Radeon RX 480
  • Additional Notes: 50 GB available space

short_description: A third person medieval multiplayer RPG where you create your own legend, the story is unwritten, your destination is unknown, 50 gold in your pocket, a sword, and the wild lands in front.
